comments.html: I have an older version of Anyconnect that no longer works since it’s a 32-bit version, and I also noticed SecureCRT freaks out when using multi-tab sessions. Has to pay to upgrade a couple other pieces of software as well. Thanks Apple
comments.name: Jingle Joe

comments.html:
So roll back using your time machine backup and wait a year for their next trial release.
Why should you handle your notebook or workstation differently than your network equipment?
comments.name: abraxxa

comments.html: There is so much sad and depressing truth in this statement.
comments.name: Marko Milivojević

comments.html: Windows 10 + WSL is the new OSX. :) Plus you have more hardware choices, and many laptops have better keyboards than the MBP... I switched just before the new year from MBP to a new HP Elite Dragonfly, and was up and running in just a few days.
comments.name: Loren
